contents.text: Advanced English
Personalized learning is the key to achieving advanced English skills. What would you like to achieve?
Your level of English
What is your level of English?
Your level is advanced!
We specialize in helping people with a basic or intermediate level to achieve an advanced level of English. Still, would you like to know more about our program?
Your level of English
No problem. We can sort out your level of English later.
Your goal
What level of English do you want to achieve?
Your goal
We specialize in taking our users to an advanced level of English.
We will help you achieve the #TARGET_LEVEL# level, but we will have the long-term goal of you reaching an advanced level of English.
Your native language
What is your native language?
Tailored for you!
Great! The Master English program is designed exclusively for Spanish speakers.
Keep in mind
The Master English program is designed for Spanish speakers. Can you use Spanish as the study language?
Keep in mind
If you can't study in Spanish, the Master English program is unfortunately not the right solution for you. Thank you for considering us!
Keep in mind
Great! In that case you can learn English with us.
Our key method
In the Master English app, we personalize your learning to make it effective.
Weâ€™ve helped over 1.2 million adults improve their English with this method.
Your motivation
Why do you need advanced English?

options.description: I want a better job or salary
I want to travel or live abroad
I want to have conversations in English

Why do you need to improve your English?

options.description: I want a better job or salary
I want to travel or live abroad
I want to have conversations in English

contents.text: Your motivation
Excellent! Having a clear motivation will drive you forward.
In Master English, we help you get closer to achieving your goals every day.
Study time
Please answer the following questions about your English skills to estimate how long it will take you to achieve an advanced level.
Introduce yourself
Can you introduce yourself in English?
Messages
Can you understand short text messages in English?

options.description: Yes, if I could use a translator

contents.text: Check-in
Can you check into a hotel speaking in English?

options.description: Yes, but it would be difficult

contents.text: Small talk
Can you ask a friend from the US how they are doing?

options.description: Yes, I could chat a little
Yes, but I may not understand the answer

contents.text: Talk about plans
Can you tell about your weekend in English?

options.description: I could only tell a little

contents.text: Short emails
Can you compose a short work-related email in English?

options.description: Yes, but it would take me time

contents.text: Meeting
If a work-related meeting is held in English, do you understand what the others are talking about?

options.description: I would understand part of the meeting

contents.text: Presentation
Can you give a presentation about your work projects in English?

options.description: Yes, but it would be difficult

contents.text: Questions
And can you answer any follow-up questions about your presentation?

options.description: It depends on the difficulty of the questions
No, it would be too difficult

contents.text: Read an email
Are you able to understand longer work-related emails in English?

options.description: Only if I could use a translator

contents.text: Calls
Can you have calls in English?

options.description: Only if the topics are easy

contents.text: Write an email
Can you write longer work-related emails in English?

options.description: Yes, but I might need help
No, it would be too difficult

contents.text: Professional image
Do you think that you give a professional image of yourself while speaking English?
Meeting with customers
Can your supervisor rely on you to speak with a foreign client in English?

options.description: Yes, but it would be a big challenge
No, it would be difficult for me to speak in English

contents.text: Promotion
Do you feel that your current English skills are good enough to get you a promotion or a better job?

options.description: Yes, but I still need to improve my English

contents.text: Responsibility
Do you feel that your current English skills allow you to have enough responsibilities at work?

options.description: I could have more if I improve my English
No, my level of English prevents me from doing so

contents.text: Living in the United States
Living abroad
Does your level of English make it difficult for you to live in the United States?
Would you feel comfortable moving to an English-speaking country?

options.description: Having a better level of English would make some situations easier
Yes, but it would be a big challenge
Yes, my limitations with English make my life difficult here
No, my level of English prevents me from doing so

contents.text: Dialects
Are you able to understand different dialects and colloquial speech in English?

options.description: Only if the person doesn't speak too fast

contents.text: Expressions
Are you able to use idiomatic expressions in a natural way in English?
Every situation
Do you feel as comfortable speaking English as you do speaking Spanish?

options.description: I feel more comfortable using my native language

contents.text: Native speaker
When you speak English, do people think you are a native speaker?
Estimated study time

Your level is advanced!
We specialize in helping people with a basic or intermediate level to achieve an advanced level of English. Still, would you like to know more about our program?

contents.text: Exit
You are going to exit the program without saving your results, are you sure?
The Master English program
It is an online program designed by native English teachers. We have created it for Spanish-speaking adults who need an advanced level.

contents.text: Let's focus on you
Each person has their own starting level, problem areas, and learning speed.
To ensure you have effective learning, in the Master English app we use advanced technology that personalizes your learning according to your needs.
Let's focus on you
We want your first English learning experience to be the best!
In our teaching model, we take into account that each person has their own initial level, areas of difficulty, and learning pace.
To ensure you have effective learning, in the Master English app we use advanced technology that personalizes your learning according to your needs.
Let's focus on you
It seems you already have a method suitable for your level. Great!
However, let's see if we could still improve your learning results.
In the Master English app, we use cutting-edge technology to detect your areas of difficulty and help you develop conversational skills.
Areas for improvement
Now, let's identify the areas where you have difficulties in English to work on them in your program. Please answer the following questions.
Vocabulary
Do you have problems with vocabulary in English?
Vocabulary
In Master English, you will learn vocabulary efficiently thanks to our spaced repetition method.
With this method, our app adapts to your learning pace.
Form sentences
Do you have problems forming full sentences in English?
Form sentences
We will teach you to form sentences that you can then use in real-life conversations.
Additionally, we will introduce you to more complex sentences according to your progress.
Listen to others
Do you struggle with understanding what others are saying in English?
Listen to others
Have you had the chance to practice your listening skills while listening to real-life conversations in English?
Listen to others
In Master English, you will have audio recordings by native speakers to get used to their accents and speaking speed.
We will also teach you to recognize the words and expressions that are difficult for Spanish speakers to understand.
Pronunciation
Do you struggle to pronounce English well?
Pronunciation
Have you ever received detailed instructions to improve your pronunciation?
Pronunciation

In the Master English app, we use speech recognition technology to detect your pronunciation mistakes and teach you how to correct them.

Additionally, you will be able to listen to yourself and compare your recordings with those of native speakers.
Conversation
Do you relate to the following?: "I wouldn't start a conversation in English because I wouldn't know how to continue it."
Conversation
In the Master English app, you will have interactive exercises designed for you to actively practice speaking English.
These exercises are set in real-life situations and focus on helping you speak English fluently.
Confidence
Do you relate to the following?: "I don't feel confident with my English, not even to use it in simple situations."
Confidence
After studying with us, you will have the confidence and skills necessary to speak English without fear, as during your learning we will ensure that:
Vocabulary
Do you struggle to express yourself in English because you feel your vocabulary is limited?
Vocabulary
Master English will speed up your vocabulary learning thanks to our cutting-edge model based on spaced repetition.
With this method, our app adapts to your learning speed.
Grammar
Do you think you lack grammar knowledge to communicate better in English?
Grammar
For many, grammar is the heaviest part of learning a language. We want to lighten that load by using a pragmatic approach:

listItems.text: We will work on the skills that most hinder your ability to communicate in English.
As you improve, you will learn grammar in a contextualized way, in just the right amount, and without overwhelming you.

contents.text: Listen to others
Do you struggle to understand English speakers because they speak too fast?
Listen to others
Have you had the chance to practice your listening skills while listening to real-life conversations in English?
Listen to others
In Master English, you will have audio recordings by native speakers to get used to their accents and speaking speed.
We will also teach you to recognize the words and expressions that are difficult for Spanish speakers to understand.
Pronunciation
Do you struggle to pronounce English well?
Pronunciation
Have you ever received detailed instructions to improve your pronunciation?
Pronunciation

In the Master English app, we use speech recognition technology to detect your pronunciation mistakes and teach you how to correct them.

Additionally, you will be able to listen to yourself and compare your recordings with those of native speakers.
Express ideas
Do you feel that you can't find the right words when you want to explain something in English?
Express ideas
Then, do you feel that you already know the words but you can't remember them fast enough?
Express ideas
Words are information, but knowing how to use them is a skill.
You will learn to develop this skill with our interactive exercises and we will help you express yourself fluently in different contexts.
Confidence
Do you relate to the following?: "I don't feel confident enough with my level of English to join a conversation."
Confidence
After studying with us, you will have the confidence and skills necessary to speak English without fear, as during your learning we will ensure that:
Vocabulary
Do you think your vocabulary is not sufficient to communicate in complex situations in English?
Vocabulary
Master English will speed up your vocabulary learning thanks to our cutting-edge model based on spaced repetition.
With this method, our app adapts to your learning speed.
Grammar
Do you have problems expressing yourself in complex situations due to your lack of grammar knowledge?
Grammar
For many, grammar is the heaviest part of learning a language. We want to lighten that load by using a pragmatic approach:

listItems.text: We will work on the skills that most hinder your ability to communicate in English.
As you improve, you will learn grammar in a contextualized way, in just the right amount, and without overwhelming you.

contents.text: Listen to others
Do you struggle to understand native English speakers when they speak at a normal pace?
Listen to others
Have you had the chance to practice your listening skills while listening to real-life conversations in English?
Listen to others
In Master English, you will have audio recordings by native speakers to get used to their accents and speaking speed.
We will also teach you to recognize the words and expressions that are difficult for Spanish speakers to understand.
Pronunciation
Do you feel insecure with your pronunciation?
Pronunciation
Have you ever received detailed instructions to improve your pronunciation?
Pronunciation

In the Master English app, we use speech recognition technology to detect your pronunciation mistakes and teach you how to correct them.

Additionally, you will be able to listen to yourself and compare your recordings with those of native speakers.
Express ideas
Do you sometimes struggle with finding the right words when you try to explain or write something in English?
Express ideas
Then, do you feel that you already know the words but you can't remember them fast enough?
Express ideas
Words are information, but knowing how to use them is a skill.
You will learn to develop this skill with our interactive exercises and we will help you express yourself fluently in different contexts.
Expressions
Do you have trouble understanding the idioms or expressions people use when speaking English?
Expressions
Don't worry, once you understand where those expressions come from, it will be much easier for you to remember them and use them in appropriate situations.
Confidence
Do you relate to the following?: "I don't feel confident enough with my level of English to participate in any conversation without hesitation."
Confidence
After studying with us, you will have the confidence and skills necessary to speak English without fear, as during your learning we will ensure that:
Be natural
Do you have problems reacting to or responding naturally in English?
Be natural
Our goal will be for you to internalize your conversational skills in English so that you feel more comfortable and natural during any conversation.
This way, you won't have to make as much cognitive effort to think about what you need to say.
Your English program
Our goal at Master English is for you to achieve an advanced level in your Speaking, Listening, Writing, and Reading skills.

contents.listHeading: Additionally, based on your answers, we will focus on these areas:

contents.text: 100% personalized
Your program will adapt to your level of English and learning speed.
You will have personalized lessons and review exercises on those topics that are most difficult for you to learn.
Additionally, we will use cutting-edge technology to detect your pronunciation errors and teach you how to correct them.
Master English is very different from any other language app you have tried before!
App Master English
You will have your English program at your fingertips in the Master English app.
Although you will have independent learning, you will not be alone. Your program will always tell you what to do.

items.text: While we prepare your program, we'll show you how it works...
We use personalized lessons to enhance your vocabulary.
We teach you how to express yourself naturally in English.
We help you apply grammar in a practical way.
You will engage in interactive and authentic conversations.
You will gain confidence to speak in English.
You will receive personalized feedback on your pronunciation.
We will show you your progress to keep you motivated.
You will develop skills that you can use in real life.
We will focus on those areas where you need to improve.
We will take you to an advanced level in English.

contents.text: You are in good hands
For the past 12 years, we have dedicated ourselves to researching how adults can improve their English in the most effective way possible.
We know how to help you!
Past experiences
In Master English, we improve your speaking skills with interactive exercises. But what kind of experiences have you had in the past?

options.description: Mostly passive, listening to the teacher

contents.text: Focus
Do you relate to the following statement?: "I wish that a professional would create a study program that would fit my needs and that I could trust."
Conversations
Do you relate to the following?: "I am highly motivated by having conversation exercises inspired by real-life situations."
Speed
Do you relate to the following statement? "When I tried to learn English before, the progress was so slow that I lost my motivation."
Reasons to improve
Do you relate to the following statement?: "External factors like better career opportunities serve as a motivator for me to improve my English."
Relevance
Do you relate to the following statement?: "To stay motivated, I need to learn content that I can apply in my day-to-day life."
Enthusiasm is key
If something is important and useful to us, it motivates us to learn it.
On the other hand, we tend to forget what seems boring to us, and that makes learning difficult.
Memory and learning
Have you ever felt that after a while you tend to forget what you have already learned in English?
Memory and learning
It's easy to forget what you learned at basic or intermediate levels, but when you reach an advanced level, it's much more likely that the learning will be permanent.

listItems.text: The more you know English, the more opportunities you will have to use it in real life, such as at work.

contents.text: This will allow you to continue perfecting your English as you will be able to use it in your daily life.
Your personal schedule
How busy are you usually?

options.description: I'm busy but I try to make time for myself
I have time for new challenges

contents.text: Your personal schedule
We understand. Let's try to find a schedule that is possible for you but still enough to deliver real results.
Your personal schedule
In that case, we can set a schedule that allows you to achieve results!
Study schedule
The most effective way to learn English is by studying between 2h 30min and 4h a week, divided into at least 3 sessions.
Which of these 3 schedules suits you?
Study schedule
The most effective way to learn English is by studying between 2h 30min and 5h per week, divided into at least 3 sessions.
Which of these 3 schedules suits you?
Study schedule
Great choice! Would you like to plan on which weekdays you usually complete your 5 weekly sessions?

options.description: Yes, I want to decide the days
I prefer to practice when I have time

contents.text: Study schedule
Great choice! Would you like to plan on which weekdays you usually complete your 3 weekly sessions?

options.description: Yes, I want to decide the days
I prefer to practice when I have time

contents.text: Study days
On which days would you like to practice?
Study days
On which days would you like to practice?
Study schedule
No problem. You can practice with our app when you have time.
But remember that to achieve results, it's better to be consistent.
Study days
Great choice! You will have your 5 weekly sessions on:
The advantage of using an app is that you can practice at any time of the day.

contents.text: Meta
#FIRSTNAME#, your program is almost ready. But before, did you know that having a set goal helps us stay motivated?
When we have a clear idea of why we are doing something, it's easier to keep going and not give up. So, let's set your goal!
Meta
My goal to achieve an advanced level in English is:

options.description: Get the job of my dreams

contents.text: Award-winning method
In 2020, Master English won the EdTech Breakthrough Award for its exceptionally fast and efficient learning method.
What sets us apart?
Discover why Master English is different from other methods.

appRatingTexts.def: More than 1,200 reviews Our app has a rating of 4.8/5 on Google Play.
More than 2,200 reviews Our app has a rating of 4.9/5 on the App Store.
More than 9,600 reviews Our app has a rating of 4.9/5 on the App Store.

contents.text: What do our users think

testimonialOptions.name: Oscar
testimonialOptions.text: A month ago I started my subscription to Master English and I am very happy with their application. I want to congratulate you on your amazing and user-friendly e-learning platform, I am enjoying it a lot. I definitely recommend it to my community of friends and work colleagues.

contents.text: Finally, we would like to know your perspective on learning English to further personalize your program.
Adult learning
Do you think adults can learn faster than children in school?
Adult learning
Correct! An adult can learn faster with the right program.
This is because adults can retain large amounts of information when they learn it in meaningful contexts and with clear explanations.
At Master English, we take into account the specific needs of adults.
Adult learning
Good news! Adults learn faster with the right program.
This is because adults can retain large amounts of information when they learn it in meaningful contexts and with clear explanations.
At Master English, we take into account the specific needs of adults.
Let's reason your schedule
Your program includes #DAYS# sessions of #MINUTES_PER_SESSION#min per week. But why not just have a single weekly session of #TOTAL_WEEKLY_TIME_SHORT#?

options.description: No one can concentrate for that long.
It's difficult to find time for such a long session
It is not possible to review what has been learned at appropriate intervals

contents.text: Let's reason your schedule
It's true, staying focused for #TOTAL_WEEKLY_TIME_SHORT# is complicated.
But the real reason is that you wouldn't be able to review what has been learned at appropriate intervals.
Why are these intervals so important?
Because our memory needs to be stimulated several times within an optimal repetition window. Otherwise, it's easy to forget what we've learned.
Let's reason your schedule
It's true, finding time for a session of #TOTAL_WEEKLY_TIME_SHORT# is complicated.
But the real reason is that you wouldn't be able to review what has been learned at appropriate intervals.
Why are these intervals so important?
Because our memory needs to be stimulated several times within an optimal repetition window. Otherwise, it's easy to forget what we've learned.
Let's reason your schedule
Correct! The problem is that you wouldn't be able to review what has been learned within reasonable intervals.
And why are these intervals so important?
Because our memory needs to be stimulated several times within an optimal repetition window. Otherwise, it's easy to forget what we've learned.
Thank you very much!
Thank you for your answers! We are finishing personalizing your program.
Results guarantee
At Master English, our mission is to help Spanish speakers achieve an advanced level of English.
And to demonstrate our confidence in the program, if you do not reach an advanced level, you do not have to pay.

options.description: Interesting, I want to know more

contents.text: Results guarantee
After completing your Master English program, you will have advanced skills in English. If not, you can get your money back in full.
Results guarantee
To check if you have achieved an advanced level, you can take any of the following official English exams.
If you do not achieve at least the results listed below, we will refund all your subscription fees in full:
If you want a refund, take your English level test and send us your results (soporte@masterenglish.com) within 2 months after you have completed your Master English program.

prePaymentTexts: Start a monthly subscription to begin your program
postPaymentTexts: Your subscription will renew monthly until you cancel it. You can cancel your subscription and your program at any time.

appRatingTexts.def: Our rating in the App Store is 4.9/5.

contents.text: Congratulations!

paragraphs.text: We believe you have made a very good decision by wanting to invest in your English learning.
It's not just about learning a language, you're investing in yourself and your future.
We have everything ready to start your learning and take you to an advanced level of English.

contents.text: Next step

paragraphs.text: Thanks to your responses to our questionnaire, we already have a clear idea of your English level.
Next, we will ask you to complete an Initial Level Test to accurately confirm your level.
Based on your results, we will make the final adjustments to your program.
